Text: FaxJeff It is Very today for some reason Be sure to let me know by email when you send it Lynne LaMarca Heinrich Senior Consultant Marts Lundy Inc Hawthorne Terrace Berkeley CA B F

BAE Nonprofit Boards Class Cc NonPrivilegedpst Greetings The Deans Office has confirmed your registration in EBA Since EBA meets for only two full class days I am asking that all students complete a series of readings prior to the first class on October th as well as a second set for the second class We have a strong panel of speakers presenting at each class and the readings will provide important context The syllabus for this course is enclosed and assigned readings are clearly indicated Please note that class attendance mandatory at both classes and the quality of class participation accounts for of your grade As the class will be full I would be most appreciative if you would bring nameplates with you to class The reader for the course is now available and Day MBA students can purchase it at Copy Central Bancroft Way Berkeley Evening MBA students can pick up a copy of the reader from the Evening MBA Program Office The syllabus is also enclosed in the reader and reading assignments are divided by class date Also please note that I have asked you to subscribe on line to Compass Point Board Caf indexhtml Should you have any questions please just send me an email Within a week of the first class I will send to you an Introductory Questionnaire which I ask that you complete and return to me prior to the first class The results will be shared with panelists guest lecturers and all class participants Thank you and I look forward to our meeting on October th Lynne LaMarca Heinrich Senior Consultant Marts Lundy Inc Adjunct Professor Haas School of Business UC Berkeley Hawthorne Terrace Berkeley CA Office Fax

BAE Questionnairedue Oct Cc NonPrivilegedpst University of California Berkeley Haas School of Business Fall BAE Nonprofit Boards of Directors PLEASE RETURN TO BY THURSDAY OCTOBER th NOON STUDENT QUESTIONNAIRE To assist us in determining your knowledge of and experience in the nonprofit sector we ask that you fill out this short questionnaire prior to the first class on October th and return it by email to as soon as possible please by no later than October th noon so results can be collated It should only take a minute In addition you should have received a previous email from me with information about the reader syllabus and class attendance If you did not receive this email please notify me immediately and I will forward it to you Thank you and I look forward to meeting you on Saturday NAME Have you served as a member of a nonprofit board before If no skip to question and if yes please answer question and Name of organizations and approximate dollar amount of operating budget In a few short phrases summarize what you feel is the most important role of a board member in a nonprofit organization In a few short phrases what have been the most exciting and challenging aspects of your board role From your perspective what do you believe are the two or three largest challenges facing the nonprofit sector today Thank you LLH Lynne LaMarca Heinrich Senior Consultant Marts Lundy Inc Hawthorne Terrace Berkeley CA Office Fax
